/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees and power lines, stretches out into the distance, leading the viewer's eye towards the horizon. A few cars and pedestrians can be seen on the street, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, contrasting with the lush greenery of the trees lining the street. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue of the sky.
